thread.title: BRIEF-Saudi Automotive Services Renews Bank Facilities Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Saudi Automotive Services Renews Bank Facilities Agreement

organizations.name: brief-saudi automotive services renews bank facilities

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - SAUDI AUTOMOTIVE SERVICES CO:
* RENEWS BANK FACILITIES AGREEMENT WITH RIYADH BANK * AGREEMENT RENEWED FOR ADDITIONAL FINANCING OF 320 MILLION RIYALS
* PURPOSE OF FINANCING IS TO REPAYMENT OF PART OF OUTSTANDING LOANS TO ENSURE POSITIVE SURPLUS IN LIQUIDITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
